 2007-12292007-08-01,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of DONALD WOODLEY of Orangeville, Ontario, a director of the board of directors of Canada Post Corporation, to be Chairperson of the board of directors of Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed.
